questions.question: The exam has been ………………………….
questions.description: To put off is to postpone.

questions.question: I might ………………………… Susie in the evening.
questions.description: To call on is to visit.

questions.question: Only a mentally strong person can ………………………….. the difficulties in life.
questions.description: To get over is to overcome.

questions.question: After trying for an hour or so, I …………………………..
questions.description: To give up is to stop.

questions.question: He and his roommate ………………………….. really well.
questions.description: To get along is to have a friendly relationship.

questions.question: My grandmother ……………………………… at the age of
questions.description: To pass away is to die.

questions.question: I have put a lot of effort ……………………… this project and I really want it to succeed.
questions.description: To put effort into something is to make a lot of effort to do it.

questions.question: That table …………………………. a lot of space.
questions.description: To take up space is to occupy space.

questions.question: ………………………….. the document before signing it.
questions.description: To go through a document is to read it carefully.

questions.question: It took them hours to ……………………………. the fire.
questions.description: To put out fire is to extinguish it.

questions.question: Sometimes adversity …………………………….. the best in people.
questions.description: To bring out is to produce.

questions.question: I …………………………… an old friend of mine yesterday.
questions.description: To run into somebody is to meet them unexpectedly.
